This should be fixed in tonight's 0.4.4 release, and I haven't seen it since I made the fix.  Mylar wasn't release image handles on shutdown, so over time they could run out.  But if you ever see this happen please reopen the report, it's really nasty how Eclipse just dies.

In which swt-release is this fix included in?

/Christian Rozet
This was a bug in Mylar (http://eclipse.org/mylar), not in SWT.  The problem was that we were not disposing of some images.  Are you seing the problem in Mylar on in your usage of SWT?

Sorry - I thought I finally found a non-design-change-solution to my "no-more-handles" SWTError ...

But mis-read the bug ... sorry!
